notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Ibirimo byawe bizahindurwa kuba ibitazwi nyirabyo mu minsi 7 kubera
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Ibirimo byawe byose muri uyu muryango bizahindurwa kuba ibitazwi nyirabyo kandi byashyingurwa mu minsi 7, nyuma yaho ntabwo uzashobora kubisiba cyangwa kubihindura. Reba ibirimo byawe biri hasi.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Ibirimo byawe byose muri iri tsinda bizahindurwa kuba ibitazwi nyirabyo kandi byashyingurwa mu minsi 7, nyuma yaho ntabwo uzashobora kubisiba cyangwa kubihindura. Reba ibirimo byawe biri hasi.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Kanda ku ishakiro ry'umuryango uri hasi, winjire nk'umuyobozi kandi uhitemo Icungamutungo rya magendu mu menyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Umubare w'ibikorwa bishoboka bya magendu bifite amahirwe angana na 75% byo kuba magendu
email.possibleFraudInformation: Sisitemu yacu yikora yaragaragaje ibikorwa bishoboka bya magendu. Ushobora kubisuzuma neza binyuze mu mbonerahamwe y'umuyobozi w'umuryango. Bimwe muri ibi bikorwa bishobora kuba bifite impamvu zitari iza magendu bityo witondere gusuzuma neza mbere yo gusiba ibirimo.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Ibirimo byahagaritswe byikora nk'ibikangishije hifashishijwe aligoritimu za AI zigenzura ubukana bw'ibirimo. Ushobora gusiba ibirimo niba bikenewe.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Aligoritimu ya AI byikora yaragaragaje amashusho afite isano n'ibi birimo. Iyi aligoritimu isuzuma amashusho ashoboka y'abantu bakuru, urugomo, iby'ubuvuzi, n'amashusho ashotora. Ushobora gusiba ibirimo niba bikenewe.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Rimwe na rimwe aligoridimu ya AI ibara amanota atari yo, muri icyo gihe ntimugire impungenge, nta kindi gikorwa musabwa gukora kandi mushobora kwirengagiza ubu butumwa.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Umwandiko w'icyongereza wakoreshejwe kugira ngo ubare amanota
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Ingingo nshya yongeweho kuri iyi gitekerezo
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Ingingo nshya yongeweho ku gitekerezo cyawe
email.postReport: Igitekerezo cyatanzweho raporo ko kinyuranyije n'amabwiriza
email.pointReport: Ingingo yatanzweho raporo ko inyuranyije n'amabwiriza
email.user_invite_2: Kanda ku ishingiro cyangwa ushyiremo mu murongo w'adiresi y'umurongo kugira ngo wemere ubutumire
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Ingingo yatowe ko itari ngombwa ku gitekerezo cyanjye
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Ingingo yatowe ko ifite akamaro ku gitekerezo cyanjye
email.reset_password_1: Dore urubuga rwo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe.
email.reset_password_2: Niba utabisabye, nyamuneka wignore iyi email.
email.reset_password_3: Ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe ntirizahinduka keretse ukoze kuri iyo link iri hejuru maze ukarema irishya.
